entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
